item.title: Central Heating Basic Quiz
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Central Heating Knowledge & Quiz§ Level Basic§ Q-1 Bedroom RST should be set to what temperature ?§ 20 Degree Centigrade Bathroom temperature should be set at 23 Degree Centigrade. Q-2 What amp fuse cartridge is used in fused spar linked to a boiler ?§ The fused spar has 3 amp cartridge All boilers requires 1 amp. While MCB ( mini circuit board ) is of 6 amp Q-3 What device reduces possible noise and boiler lock out ?

item.title: Common Plumbing Process Basic Quiz
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Common Plumbing and processing Basic Knowledge & Quiz§ Q-1 What plastic pipes are used in for sanitation, drainage and rain water ?§ Mainly PVC **Polyvinyl chloride**and ABS **Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene** are used for the above purposes. PVC comes in different types. CPVC: Chlorinated Polyvinyl chloride: They are produced by chlorination of PVC resin to make it more flexible than mere PVC, they can be used for both cold and hot water due to tolerating heat up to 180 degree Fahrenheit.
